Text:
Scene4All - Thanks much for this one!  Its been a while since A proper/good UE torrent has been available.  

One request if its not too much to ask... any chance of getting the same for IDM's UltraEdit Studio aka UEStudio?
Any chance to do the same with UltraCompare v8.5 ?

Impossible to use this torrent, could you help me ?
I can't find the offline-activation option. The only available option is the online one!
Impossible to use the key gen software which asks for identifiers I'm unable to find (user code 1 and user code 2)
By the way, what CORE10k.exe (which belongs to the torrent) used for ? 

Best regards.
Disable your internet, click register (which should fail), then click proxy option,

follow the instructions on tpb for this torrent:
 2F881AE8C38415D4C10D8F0589F14ED21B30A11B

@jerenskyy 
Thank you for your prompt and efficient replies!
Have a good day.
Claude
It actually only worked for me after I removed the mentioned entries from my hosts file. Then it moved on to offline activation and everything worked fine.
